Regarding evolvability, can we really say if new hypermedia controls should=
 or shouldn't "break" a hypermedia client? This seems to get a bit fuzzy wh=
en a new resource interaction may be required for a given application domai=
n.
--_21FA2F73-EF17-336F-8D8D-93004CA7BE93_
